item.description:
A few of us are going to the show. Check out the latest new cars, crossovers, hybrids, light trucks & SUVs being presented.

Tix are $12.00 purchased at the door.

For more info:

www.bostonautoshow.com

The show runs thru Monday.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance. I will provide my cell # also.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: NE Int'l Auto Show
